content: same space you entered in part a of instructions cut the thread loop 4th picture bellow d tie the tails together 3x to secure well then weave back into body to hide or you can use your hook to pull tail inside of plush tip there is no wrong way to do this but you can use the pictures as a guide to replicate my technique or use a different technique check out youtube to see videos on how to attach keychain rings if needed assembly picture guide keychain attachment disclaimer congrats you re done making your sour gummy worm keychain thank you for your support again and i hope that you enjoyed making this pattern you are welcome to make and sell items using my pattern but please do not claim as your own invention and give me credit as the pattern creator my name/handle on instagram tiktok twitter etc is bombercrafts feel free to tag me for pattern credit purposes or to share with me your makes i would love to see your crocheted sour gummy worm keychain *do not share my pattern privately link people to my kofi shop or ravelry instead so they can buy/download the patterns for themselves
